title: Sign up & Login
content: Users can sign up using Email + Password. Passwords are hashed before storage. After signup, users can login with their email/password to get a session (JWT).

title: Publishing blogs
content: To publish a blog go to 'New Post' -> enter Title and Content -> Submit. Only logged-in users can publish posts. Posts are stored in the database and are visible to all visitors.

title: Editing & Deleting
content: Only the author of a blog post can edit or delete the post. The UI hides edit/delete buttons for other users.

title: Database & Passwords
content: The app uses SQLite with Prisma. Passwords must be hashed in the backend (bcrypt recommended).

title: Errors & Troubleshooting
content: If you see '401 unauthorized', ensure you are logged in and your request includes the authorization token. If server errors occur, check the server logs for stack traces and Prisma migrations.

title: Agent Capabilities
content: This support agent answers common questions about the blogging platform. It's not a substitute for a human admin and relies on a static knowledge base. If the answer is not found, it will suggest contacting support.
